mapper.select: select mei.EDU_SEQ as eduId , mei.edu_type as eduType , mei.EDU_DIV as eduDiv , mei.EDU_START_DT as eduDtFm , mei.EDU_END_DT as eduDtTo , mei.edu_etc as eduEtc , mei.edu_hour as eduHour , mei.EDU_PLACE as eduPlace , mei.EDU_NM as eduNm , mm.USER_NM as userNm , (select GENDER from mind_mgr_sub mms where mm.USER_ID = mms.USER_ID) as gender , (select CENTER_NM from mind_center mc where mm.CENTER_SEQ = mc.CENTER_SEQ ) as centerNm , mm.CENTER_SEQ as centerSeq from MIND_EDU_COMPLETE mei INNER JOIN mind_mgr mm ON mei.USER_ID = mm.USER_ID where 1=1 and EDU_SEQ = #{eduId}
select center_seq as centerSeq, center_nm as centerNm from mind_center
select USER_ID as userId, USER_NM as userNm from mind_mgr where center_seq = #{centerSeq}
